0.1.name: wordpress/tweep-roll
0.1.description: When I find a Tweep (a Twitter friend) that tweets about interesting things, I’m always interested to see who they are following. So I have created a Wordpress plugin called “Tweep Roll” which is like Blogroll, but shows a list of your Twitter friends instead. So if someone reads your blog and finds you interesting, they may want to follow whoever you are following.
